metadata.title: CVE-2020-22597 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in Jerrscript- project Jerryscrip v. 2.3.0 allows a remoteattacker to execute arbitrary code via theecma_builtin_array_prototype_object_slice parameter.

criterions.comment: iotjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
